PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_SystemFurnitureElementTypeWorkSurface
PropertySetDef.Definition: A set of specific properties for work surfaces used in workstations. HISTORY: First issued in IFC Release R1.5. Renamed from Pset_Worksurface

PropertyDef.Name: UsePurpose
PropertyDef.Definition: The principal purpose for which the work surface is intended to be used e.g. writing/reading, computer, meeting, printer, reference files, etc.

PropertyDef.Name: SupportType
PropertyDef.Definition: Available support types from which that required may be selected.

PropertyDef.Name: HangingHeight
PropertyDef.Definition: The hanging height of the worksurface.

PropertyDef.Name: NominalThickness
PropertyDef.Definition: The nominal thickness of the object. The size information is provided in addition to the shape representation and the geometric parameters used within. In case of inconsistency between the geometric parameters and the size properties, provided in the attached property set, the geometric parameters take precedence.

PropertyDef.Name: ShapeDescription
PropertyDef.Definition: A description of the shape of the work surface e.g. corner square, rectangle, etc.
